title: Getting random fps drops in games
body:
Title
Clutch moments,any ideas and fixes rito employees?

replies.body: Can you give me a few more details? Depending on your hardware and configuration, some small drops in FPS may be normal, but I'll need more information to understand exactly what you're experiencing.

It doesn't happen very often,but the fact that it does bothers me. My specs are an Intel Core CPU 1.9 GHz with 4GB RAM. Sometimes it drops for a second or two,just recently it dropped during the loading screen and i reconnected at the 2 minute mark(Vi game i lost with afk yasuo). (In my fiora game) It dropped for up to three minutes. Also, some games when i drag the map over to another champion or multiple champions start spamming it drops.

Gotcha. The majority of framerate issues are caused by malfunctioning display drivers or misconfigured windows power settings. I'd like you to work through our [**FPS Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting), as it covers the most frequent solutions for this issue.

If you encounter further issues with this, let me know.
